original_text: And David made a name for himself when he returned from striking down 18,000 Edomites in the Valley of Salt.
korean_text: 다윗이 소금 골짜기에서 에돔 사람 만 팔천 명을 쳐죽이고 돌아와서 명성을 떨치니라

sentences.original_text: And David made a name for himself
when he returned from striking down 18,000 Edomites
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 에돔 사람 만 팔천 명을 쳐부수고 돌아왔을 때
